title: Pretty Fly For A White Guy: The Complete Series Collection (Books 1-4) (Interracial BWWM Romance Book 1)
features: DON'T MISS OUT, GRAB THIS WHILE IT IS CHEAP!GET THE WHOLE SERIES FOR LESS THEN THE PRICE OF A SKINNY LATTE!This is the COMPLETE collection of the epic interracial bwwm romance series, Pretty Fly For A White Guy -- all FOUR episodes in one. Save 50% versus buying the individual books!Drama, Conflict, Revenge, Jealousy, Insecurities and Misunderstandings.Life is never going to be simple when you are dating a man who is pretty fly for a white guy!Kenneth is the love of Nicole's life.However, it has been over a year since they were together officially and all signs are suggesting it is over for good between them. The fact he is now dating her ex-best friend is just the tip of the iceberg. Can she ever get over him and find happiness with someone else? Or should she fight for the man she believes she is meant to be with?What follows next are twists and turns that simply have to be seen to be believed... This Complete Series Includes ALL Pretty Fly episodes:Episode 1 - The PilotEpisode 2 - RevengeEpisode 3 - TroubleEpisode 4 - FinaleWarning: This story does contain scenes of a sexual nature and is the type of book your mama will have warned you about. This black woman & white man interracial romance is a 25,000 word novella.
description: IÂ absolutely loved...loved...loved...loved...the entire series. I wasconstantly on the edge of my seat waiting for what was going to happennext. -
Most women can relate to the trials and tribulations of Nicole and Kenneth. -
There was a lot of twist and turns in this series. -
Thank you Lena for making me bite nails the entire time I was reading this book! -

is a popular romance author who specializes in AfricanAmerican & Multicultural romance stories. Having been brought up in a world where she struggled to find any romance stories featuring African American characters, Lena decided to do what she could to offersomething to those who enjoy the genre just as much as she does.

Check out my most popular series:', 'The Independent Women > https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00R52OGLU', 'The White Billionaire > https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00INF533I', 'Pretty Fly For A White Guy > https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00JALHAEE', 'Heyy', 'So... My name is Lena Skye and I have been writing romance for a long while now but only recently got published for the first time. I like to specialise in African American and Multicultural Romance as I feel it is so lacking in the world and I could never find such books available to read when I was a young girl. I would search the library up and down for a book featuring black characters and would find nothing. So I am determined to help change that.', 'When I am not drinking a skinny Latte and tapping away on my keyboard, I love to go shopping and add to my collection of heels. The higher the better!', 'Peace, Love & High Heels', 'Lena xx']}
